title: Development of Tourism and Hospitality Services under Community Nature Conservancy around wild life sanctuaries and national parks shall be permitted as per Regulation No
clause_text: Development of Tourism and Hospitality Services under Community Nature Conservancy around wild life sanctuaries and national parks shall be permitted as per Regulation No.14.9.
